level.heading: TICKET VENDING MACHINES AND DEVICES (ยง 30-505)

level.text: The Executive Director may authorize the use of instant ticket vending machines, player activated terminals, or other stand alone mechanical or electronic devices for the sale of lottery tickets at agent locations.

Prior to the implementation of ticket sales pursuant to this section, the Executive Director shall adopt written procedures and criteria governing the sales. The Executive Director shall also adopt written procedures and criteria regarding the assignment of authorized sales devices to agents.

No person shall make a sale authorized by this section unless the vending device has been authorized and the sale consummated in accordance with this section and procedures established by the Executive Director.
